basics.name: Om Rajendra Kathalkar
basics.label: Research Scholar
basics.summary: MS by Research student in Electronics and Communication, focused on Computer Vision and Deep Learning applications in IoT for environmental monitoring

work.name: Signal Processing and Communications Research Centre, IIIT-H
work.summary: Researching the application of Machine Learning and Computer Vision in IoT for environmental monitoring. Developed CV algorithms on edge devices for AQI estimation and remote labs for conservation experiments.
highlights: Filed a patent on 'Computer Vision Technique for Performing an Experiment Remotely.'
Developed real-time AQI estimation system in Hyderabad using computer vision.

work.name: e-Yantra Labs, IIT-Bombay
work.summary: Worked on a warning system for vehicles in waterlogged areas, using advanced sensors and displays for precise water level detection.
highlights: Designed and implemented a system to address urban waterlogging issues.

education.institution: St. Vincent Pallotti College of Engineering and Technology, Nagpur

publications.name: CV and IoT-based Remote Triggered Labs: Use Case of Conservation of Mechanical Energy
publications.summary: Paper on using Computer Vision for RTL in energy conservation experiments. Demonstrated CV-based implementation with improved accuracy over IR-based methods.

publications.name: Protocol for Hunting PM2.5 Emission Hot Spots in Cities
publications.summary: Developed a mobile protocol using IoT for identifying PM2.5 hot spots, highlighting urban pollution patterns and health risks.

publications.name: TRAQID - Traffic-Related Air Quality Image Dataset
publications.summary: Introduced TRAQID, a traffic-related air quality dataset with over 27,000 images, to improve image-based AQI estimation methods.

patents.title: System and Method for Implementing an Experiment Remotely Using a Computer Vision Model
System and Method for Generating Traffic-Related Air Quality Image Datasets
System and Method for Generating Multi-modal Sensor Dataset for Traffic Related Pollution

awards.title: International Environmental Sensing Project Competition
awards.summary: Winner in environmental sensing project competition.

projects.name: Remote Triggered Labs for Energy Conservation
projects.summary: Developed remote labs for energy conservation using Computer Vision to enable virtual experiments with real-time outputs.

projects.name: IoT-based AQI Estimation using Image Processing
projects.summary: Implemented an IoT network for real-time AQI estimation in Hyderabad by integrating sensor data and image processing.
